name: Penitent Dead
description:
There are whispers that the Endlyss have broken the armistice, and our kingdoms will again be engulfed in war. As a Knight of the Black Order, you have been called upon to investigate.

For info on future releases, please check out @LovelyHellplace on Twitter.

---    Left Click = Use    ---    Right Click = Inventory    ---    Esc = Menu---

---    E = Sword ---    Q = Scope ---
